name: Standing Dog
tag_list: internet-marketing, seo, social-media, sem, hospitality, hotels
overview:
Standing Dog is an interactive marketing and development agency in Dallas, TX.

Standing Dog provides search engine optimization, pay per click services, online media placement, social media marketing and web design and development.

We have a specialty group that focuses on the hospitality vertical which works with major brands such as Omni Hotels and Marriott in the US and Rydges Hotels in Australia.

We developed the leading social media monitoring application for hotels called ReviewAnalyst (www.reviewanalyst.com). Over 2000 hotels are using the application including all Starwood hotels.
